pullrequest.title: Improve gpu laser and its sensor shutdown

content.raw:
The Sigsegv is avoided if I comment [this line](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3026/improve-gpu-laser-and-its-sensor-shutdown/diff#Lgazebo/sensors/GpuRaySensor.ccF339T342). So the problem is produced when the Sensor object is destroyed. The back trace makes reference to this [specific line](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f0e9467ffe35e0f5e4578ab5b623ca8f64c93864/gazebo/common/Event.cc#lines-67). I would say that the issue is produced when it tries to destroy the connections from the sensor.   
  
I am not able to reproduce this issue with Gazebo9 alone. It seems related to the way that GpuRayPlugin closes the connections when it is used in for the  GazeboRosPlugin…
content.html:
The Sigsegv is avoided if I comment this line. So the problem is produced when the Sensor object is destroyed. The back trace makes reference to this specific line. I would say that the issue is produced when it tries to destroy the connections from the sensor.

I am not able to reproduce this issue with Gazebo9 alone. It seems related to the way that GpuRayPlugin closes the connections when it is used in for the GazeboRosPlugin…
